sentence.Network_en: Malone looked out at the grey-green featureless landscape.
sentence.Network_cn: 马隆向外看着毫无特色的灰绿色的景致。

sentence.Network_en: The countryside is flat and featureless.
sentence.Network_cn: 这乡村一马平川，平淡无奇。

sentence.Network_en: Out of a starting point in a constant featureless environment, life spontaneously diversified.
sentence.Network_cn: 在恒常不变没有特色的环境中, 生命会自发地走向多样化.

that the terrain to which his auditors are released is dauntingly featureless did not curb Emerson's own delight in solitary freedom .他的听众被指引去的地方是令人畏惧、毫无特色的，但这并没有束缚住爱默生在孤独的自由中享有的喜悦。
that the terrain to which his auditors are released is dauntingly featureless did not curb Emerson's own delight in solitary freedom .他的听众被指引去的地方是令人畏惧、毫无特色的，但这并没有束缚住爱默生在孤独的自由中享有的喜悦。

list.abs: television programmes , particular , do not compete for audiences on a completely featureless playing field .尤其是电视节目，不要在一个完全没有特点的领域竞争观众。

entry.tran: 无特色的;平凡的;平淡无奇的
entry.def: If you say that something is featureless, you mean that it has no interesting features or characteristics.

example.ex: Malone looked out at the grey-green featureless landscape.
example.tran: 马隆向外看着毫无特色的灰绿色的景致。

auth_sentence.content: The house is square and more or less featureless.
auth_sentence.res_content: The house is square and more or less featureless.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The house is square and more or less featureless.

auth_sentence.content: The river is a wide dark featureless stream.
auth_sentence.res_content: The river is a wide dark featureless stream.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The river is a wide dark featureless stream.

auth_sentence.content: The month will be so featureless.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The month will be so featureless.
